name: Knock Down with Balls.io
description:
Get your hands on our new hyper casual game. Tap on the screen, shoot the structure down to up your level & get the highest score. But it’s not that easy. The enemy drone will try to destroy your weapons. So, shoot them down or shoot the structure before your health runs out.

You think it’s difficult now? You have to do this in a limited time as well. So, get ready for the best & most adventurous taps of your life.

Main Features:

Time Limits
Enemy drone
Tap on target to hit the blocks
One touch smooth control
Best shooting experience
